characters.name: Shigeo Kageyama
characters.description:
**Height:** 157 cm

He is the assistant and disciple of Arataka Reigen. He is also the newest member of the Body Improvement Club.
Shigeo is a quiet and polite individual who tries to live a normal life despite having strong telepathic power, he wants to be seen as a good human among the people in his social life. This often makes him naive and gullible when those with malicious intent want to use him for a laugh or to cause trouble but Shigeo has very strong beliefs to never use his powers to hurt another person because of an altercation he faced once as a child.

characters.name: Arataka Reigen
characters.description:
__Height:__ 179 cm (5'10.5")

Mob's mentor and boss in the Mob Psycho 100 series. He owns a business exorcising ghosts and is a self-proclaimed psychic. 

He is Mob's moral compass. He was the first person to ever consider Mob as normal and his teachings have never failed Mob.

characters.name: Ekubo
characters.description:
Ekubo is a self-proclaimed upper-class evil spirit who has aligned himself with Mob after being defeated by him.

Ekubo wants to be a god. Specifically, he wants to be worshipped by all humanity. 
~!Despite having that kind of ego, he didn't hesitate to put himself at Mob's mercy in the hopes of using the boy to his advantage. At first, he wanted to steal Mob's body and use it to become a god, but he eventually decided to try to make Mob a god instead.!~

characters.name: Narrator
characters.description:
This character page is set to represent and list all narrators, which haven't been given a visual representation of themselves in their respective work. 

Please add other narrator characters, which were given a visual representation of themselves, separately from this narrator page.

characters.name: Ritsu Kageyama
characters.description:
__Height:__ 159.4 cm

Ritsu is very clever and apparently serious, he also serves on the student council and excels in academics and everything else he tries. None of that matters to him as much as psychic power, however, his brother is more important to him than anyone or anything else.

~!Before he awoke his own psychic powers, he longed for the esper abilities his brother has always had and was frustrated by his own inability to do things like bend spoons. He may have a habit of carrying spoons around with him, for bending purposes. He is a perfectionist with a not-so-hidden dark side. Unlike Mob, he finds it okay to use psychic violence against people when necessary.!~

characters.name: Tenga Onigawara
characters.description: Tenga Onigawara is the leader of Salt Middle School and an unofficial member of the Body Improvement Club.

characters.name: Tome Kurata
characters.description:
__School:__ Salt Middle School
__School club: __Telepathy Club (President)

Tome seems to be a slacker but is passionate about the possibility of using telepathy to contact extraterrestrials. However, when the Telepathy Club's research into the matter bears no results, she quickly gives up. When she learns that Mob is an Esper, her passion is revitalized.

characters.name: Teruki Hanazawa
characters.description:
__Height:__ 161.4 cm

Hanazawa Teruki is an esper who was first introduced as an antagonist, but later became Mob's friend after being defeated by him. He was the shadow leader (urabanchou) of Black Vinegar Middle School, using his psychic powers to rule over the delinquents at his own school, as well as to defeat those from other schools.

Teruki is a talented, quick-thinking, and hardworking esper. In terms of raw power, he is nowhere near Mob's level, but he compensates for this by putting in effort and training diligently. He is able to analyze other espers' techniques and their weaknesses in a short amount of time, and often incorporates said techniques in his own fights. He is constantly training to improve himself, and is remarked by various espers as possessing a keen and powerful set of skills.

characters.name: Ichi Mezato
characters.description: Ichi Mezato is a  school girl who goes to Salt Middle School and is part of the News Club.  She is in class 2-1.

characters.name: Takane Tsubomi
characters.description:
She is a middle schooler at Salt Middle School. Mob harbors a large crush on her.

~!Most of what we know about Tsubomi's personality in the manga is from what Mob and other characters say about her. However, in the anime adaptation, there are extra scenes of Tsubomi that add to her character and personality and make her a more compassionate individual.!~

characters.name: Shou Suzuki
characters.description: ~!Sho Suzuki is the son of the leader of Claw. He led a direct resistance against his father's world domination plan.!~

characters.name: Musashi Gouda
characters.description: Musashi Goda is a student of Salt Middle School and the Body Improvement Club's President. Musashi has a strong sense of justice but strongly disagrees with senseless violence

characters.name: Gou Asahi
characters.description: Gou is an esper and one of the children who was invited to the Awakening Lab.

characters.description: Rei is an esper and one of the children who was invited to the Awakening Lab

characters.description: Takeshi is an esper and one of the children who was invited to the Awakening Lab

characters.description: Matsuo is an esper and a former member of Claw. He was part of the upper echelon called "Scar".

characters.description: The partner of Koyama who is also one of the executives of the Tsume group.

characters.name: Takeuchi
characters.description: Takeuchi is an esper and a former member of Claw. He was part of the upper echelon called "Scar".

characters.description: Tsuchiya is an esper and a former member of Claw. She was part of the upper echelon called "Scar".

characters.name: Mukai
characters.description: Mukai is an esper and a former member of Claw. She was the youngest member of the upper echelon called "Scar".

characters.name: Toichirou Suzuki
characters.description: Toichiro is an extremely powerful esper and the founder and leader of Claw.

characters.name: Kaito Shiratori
characters.description: Kaito is an esper, the twin brother of Daichi Shiratori, and one of the children who was invited to the Awakening Lab.

characters.name: Daichi Shiratori
characters.description: Daichi is an esper, the twin brother of Kaito Shiratori, and one of the children who was invited to the Awakening Lab.

characters.name: Terada
characters.description: Terada is an esper and a former member of Claw. He was part of the upper echelon called "Scar".

characters.name: Mob no Chichi
characters.description: Mob's Father.

characters.name: Kenji  Mitsuura
characters.description: He is the founder of the Awakening Lab.

characters.name: Shinji Kamuro
characters.description: He is the president of the student council at Salt Middle School.

characters.name: Hikaru Tokugawa
characters.description: He is the vice-president of the school council of Salt Mid.

characters.name: Hiroshi Kumagawa
characters.description: He is part of the Body Improvement Club and a student of Salt Middle School.

characters.name: Hideki  Yamamura
characters.description: He is a student of Salt Middle School and a member of the Body Improvement Club.

characters.name: Banshoumaru Shinra
characters.description: He is the self-proclaimed "greatest psychic of the century" and a member of the Sun Psychic Union led by Kirin Shoudou.

characters.name: Minori Asagiri
characters.description:
Minori Asagiri is a middle-school girl and the daughter of a wealthy businessman.

Asagiri is very spoiled and very cruel. The first we see of her, she throws a tantrum due to dissatisfaction over lavish birthday presents. This is her true personality, according to her father, that existed before she was possessed by Mogami. Within the world Mogami created and trapped Mob in, she acts very similarly. She bullies, isolates and abuses Mob. Apparently, she does this because she wants to prove herself superior, and by preying on those who are weaker and can't stand up for themselves, she establishes her position. However, after being saved by Mob, she is brought to tears and resolves to become a better person because of him.

characters.name: Jun Sagawa
characters.description: He is a student of Salt Middle School and the president of the Body Improvement Club.

characters.name: Kirin Shodou
characters.description:
He is a haughty psychic and the President of the Sun Psychic Union. 

~!Like many other self-proclaimed psychics, Shodo possesses no special abilities. However, he was able to produce a noticeable aura in his ultimately fruitless attempt to exorcize​ Keiji Mogami from Minori Asagiri's body.!~

characters.name: Emi
characters.description:
She is a student at Salt Middle School.

Emi first appears as a questionably nice girl who shows an interest in Mob. She has an interest in books and writing novels. ​However, she seems to be easily influenced by her friends and quickly interprets things others say about her negatively, even if they weren't meant that way. She was grateful to Mob for retrieving and restoring her writings after they were torn up.

characters.name: Haruto  Kijibayashi
characters.description: He is a third-year middle school student and a member of the Telepathy Club.

characters.name: Keiji Mogami
characters.description:
Keiji Mogami is "This Century's Greatest Psychic" and a former Psychic who turned into an evil spirit upon death.

Keiji Mogami is a very bitter man, sick of the greed and selfishness of humanity. Because of the private dealings he did while alive, he has lost his moral compass and has become a twisted variant of his former self. After becoming an evil spirit, he vowed to use his power for his own intentions and fix the world by possessing people who appear to gather grudges around them. To that end, Mogami is willing to destroy a girl's body and brutally impale her father to achieve his whims.

characters.name: Katsuya Serizawa
characters.description: He is an extremely powerful Esper who was formerly a part of the Super 5 of Claw. He now works at the agency alongside Reigen and Mob.

characters.name: Kunekune
characters.description: was an upper-class evil spirit who made his home ruining the crops of a farmer.

characters.name: Mameta  Inukawa
characters.description: He is a second-year middle school student and a member of the Telepathy Club.

characters.name: Ryohei Shimura
characters.description: He is a student of Salt Middle School and a member of the Body Improvement Club.

characters.name: Masashi Asagiri
characters.description: He is a businessman​ and the client who hired psychics to get rid of the spirit possessing his daughter Minori Asagiri.

characters.name: Nozomu Hatori
characters.description: He is a powerful Esper and a former member of the terrorist organization​ Claw as part of the Ultimate 5.

characters.name: Toshiki Minegishi
characters.description: He is a powerful esper, a former member of the terrorist organization​ Claw and once part of the Ultimate 5.

characters.name: Ryou Shimazaki
characters.description: He is a powerful esper, member of the now defunct terrorist organization​ Claw and a former part of the Ultimate 5.

characters.name: Sakakibara
characters.description: He is an esper and former leader of actually disbanded terrorist organization Claw's 5th Division.

characters.name: Furutachi
characters.description: He is an esper and former leader of 2nd Division of Claw.

characters.name: Igarashi
characters.description: He is an esper and former leader of actually disbanded terrorist organization Claw's 6th Division.

characters.name: Udo
characters.description: He is a mercenary and an Esper.

characters.name: Tamaki
characters.description: He is an esper and former leader of 1st Division of Claw.

characters.name: Hitoshi
characters.description:
He was a client of Arataka Reigen, he wanted to speak with his deceased father about a password to a safe.

~!He attempted to stab Reigen to get the combo but was knocked out by Reigen.!~

characters.name: Ebiwara
characters.description: He is an esper and former leader of actually disbanded terrorist organization Claw's 3rd Division.

characters.name: Fukuda
characters.description: He is an esper and one of Sho Suzuki's subordinates.

characters.name: Miguel
characters.description: He is an esper and mercenary.

characters.name: Higashio
characters.description: He is an esper and one of Sho Suzuki's subordinates.

characters.name: Otsuki
characters.description: He is an esper and one of Sho Suzuki's subordinates.

characters.name: Yanagawa
characters.description: He is an esper and former leader of actually disbanded terrorist organization Claw's 4th Division.

characters.name: Joseph
characters.description: He is an esper mercenary and assassin hired by the government.

characters.name: Hiroshi Yabe
characters.description: He is a Prime Minister abducted by Shimazaki.

characters.name: Hiroshi Shibata
characters.description: He is a (formerly powerful) esper and a former member of the terrorist organization​ Claw as a part of the Ultimate 5.

characters.name: Ishihara
characters.description: He is an esper and former member of actually disbanded terrorist organization Claw's 4th Division
